Kameyama Paris  a young leader of the Kamematsu clan  attends a party of the Akaiyakai  Japan's largest chivalrous organization. There  he takes away Elene  the wife of the clan leader he met. Furious  the chairman of the Akaiyakai calls Achilles  a man called "demigod " to go after Paris...
In the flash of a moment! If you teach martial arts to 100 000 warriors  only one or two of would become true swordsmen...
A perfectionist model student believed love was a luxury. Suddenly  four choices appear and her heart wavers. Is this okay?

title_en: Puberty  an All Boys School!? and Nakano-kun
description: Hajime Nakano is forced by his mother to enroll at a newly opened all boys high school  and he laments over having to spend the next three years surrounded by other guys. However  he doesn't know that all of the other students are girls secretly pretending to be guys  and each of them think they are the only girl in the whole school.

Uma Musume: Cinderella Gray is a spin-off title of the Uma Musume project by Cygames. It follows Oguri Cap through her time at Kasamatsu Training Center Academy and on her journey of becoming a legendary horse girl.

Empress Desa  a great witch and ambassador for the founding of the country  proposes a bet to find herself among 108 people with identical faces to test the emperor's sincerity. Meanwhile  'Arit'  a young witch who admires Desa  secretly participates in the bet to stop Desa?!  --- Dessa  a witch who built an empire for the human she loved  but did not believe in him. In a situation where she must renounce her witch’s powers and become an ordinary human in order to give birth to an imperial heir  she proposes a bet to test Emperor Hartwan  who swore eternal love. To find her among 108 women with the same face. Emperor Hartwan accepts this  and in the end  no matter who he chooses  he even puts out an unconventional condition to welcome the chosen one as an empress. The empire and 107 women resembling the witch gather at the imperial palace. Meanwhile  Arit  a young witch who admires Dessa sneaks into the imperial palace in order to prevent Dessa from becoming human  interferes with the her bet with the emperor?! The search for the empress proceeds with chaos. Who will win in the end?
Romance  such thing cannot exist between us!

title_en: Kanojo ga Senpai ni NTR-reta node  Senpai no Kanojo wo NTR-masu
description: Yuu Isshiki  is a freshman in college. For the first time in his life  when he learned that Karen  his girlfriend was sleeping with his senior in the circle  Kamokura  he was so shocked  angered  and desperate that he called Kamokura's girlfriend  Touko  and told her with an impulse. Please have sex with me  Touko senpai! " If you get NTR-ed  then the return should be NTR as well! A topical "revenge" romantic comedy that depicts the relationship between the mind and body of four college students  a shocking story now in manga form!

tags: Long Strip|Comedy|Boys' Love|Self-Published|School Life|Web Comic|Full Color
description: A goth boy and a jock forms a bond over time...

"Millie" (golden haired)  the perfect little girl whose life is fully equipped with everything  but because of her timeless mother  Millie has become an indifferent day-to-day person until she meets "Zen" (black-headed)  an ordinary little girl whose life focussed on only studying  without Zen knowing that she herself was stirring up Millie's heart to beat again.

title_en: Keishichou Majuu Taisakushitsu – Oukami Keiji to Mezame no Kenja
description: The story is set in Japan  700 years after the age of swords and magic  where science has replaced magic. Social problems caused by magic and magical beasts are on the rise  and the Metropolitan Police Department establishes the Metropolitan Police Department's Magical Beast Control Division to deal with them. Kamishima Jingo  a werewolf (lycanthrope)  is investigating a horrific case as a detective in the Magical Beast Control Division.  Meanwhile  the great elven sage Sajuel  who had been asleep for 700 years in preparation for the return of the Demon King  wakes up. However  the Demon King was resurrected and defeated 40 years ago. Sajuel is shocked to learn this  but he lends his wisdom to the Magical Beast Control Division and begins investigating with Kamishima and the others. A fantasy of magic and police unfolds.

Tales of a high-school calligraphy club.      A story about a high-school calligraphy club on the verge of breaking up that enters in a major competition while overcoming problems. Yuki  a promising female judoist  and Yukari  a quiet Canadian-raised boy who just returned to Japan  end up joining the club for the sake of maintaining the membership required to keep the club. Together with the old club members with unique characters  they gradually discover the fun of calligraphy and work together to win in the competition.      Tomehane! was nominated for best manga at the first two Manga Taisho.  Live action series adaptation (2010): [MyDramaList](https://mydramalist.com/742-tomehane)

Braveman is your average superhero. Unfortunately for him  his arch-nemesis also happens to be a stalker and his number one fan. Follow their story as Braveman struggles to overcome his greatest adversary and retain his peace of mind.

The story centers around a main character who was raised as a butler from his family's trade  and who one day meets a rich young lady who cannot even change her own clothes  let alone know what to do in the outside world.

title_en: Akuyaku Reijou ni Tensei Shita Inaka Musume ga Bad End Kaihi ni Idomu Hanashi ~Shinitakunai no de Last Boss Yori Tsuyoku Natte Mita~
description: A girl living in the countryside is attacked by a monster and meets an unexpected death. When she wakes up  she has been reborn as the villainess in the story of her favorite book! In order to avoid a life of "certain doom" in which she will be killed by the Demon King as the enemy of the heroine  she acquires the strongest power  but ends up embarking on an unknown route in which the Demon King proposes to her...!?  (Source: Manga UP!  translated)

title_en: Zense wa Reikoku Koutei  Konse wa Youjo
description: "Juliana  your fiancé has been decided.” At that moment  the frail daughter of an earl awakened to a shocking truth—within her resided the soul of the infamous "Cold-Hearted Emperor" Julius. A man whose ruthless conquests left behind mountains of corpses and an empire under his iron rule.   Now  reborn as a delicate young noble girl  Julius finds himself in a seemingly peaceful era. But beneath the surface lurk corruption  poverty  and disease  all exploited by scheming villains. With the wisdom and might of a former emperor  Juliana will not stand idly by. The young lady who once ruled as a tyrant is ready to cleanse the empire once more—this time  with her tiny hands.   A dark yet thrilling tale of power  justice  and a battle against the hidden evils of the empire begins!

title_en: Imaizumin-chi wa Douyara Gal no Tamariba ni Natteru Rashii ~DEEP~
description: During the day  Imaizumi attends his classes like any dutiful student  only to return each evening to a home full of hotties! It seems his home has become the go-to hangout for the coolest gyarus in town. From endless gossip fests to snack binges to getting downright physical with his three new housemates  his once-quiet abode is now buzzing with non-stop energy and exciting escapades. Can Imaizumi keep up with the lively antics of his lusty gal pals?

In this world  Sensha-do  the art of tank-combat  is a traditional Japanese martial art for girls. Miho  a girl who just transfered into the Ooarai Girls' Academy in Ibaraki Prefecture  has been ordered by the academy's student council chairperson to join the school team and compete in the national Sensha-do championships.

There are gamblers out there who even bet their lives as ante. But to secure the integrity of these life-threatening gambles  a violent and powerful organization by the name of “Kakerou” referees these games as a neutral party. Follow Baku Madarame a.k.a. Usogui (The Lie Eater) as he gambles against maniacal opponents at games – such as Escape the Abandoned Building  Old Maid  and Hangman – to ultimately “out-gamble” and control the neutral organization of Kakerou itself.     ---  **Links:**   - [OAV on ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=14163)
A small series that frankly depicts the circumstances of a third-grade girl living in Shibuya and her family.

title_en: Omae ni Ore wa Dou Utsuru
description: A society where humans and beastmen coexist—  Mizuki  a human police officer  fears beastmen due to “a certain past.” But the new partner assigned to him is Ryo  a beastman.  Ryo's relentless  unapologetic closeness keeps throwing the serious Mizuki off balance.  Despite their incompatible relationship  they're dispatched to a crime scene. When Mizuki is saved by Ryo's beastman powers in a pinch... ?  Beastman × Human: An Uneven Love Action!
Adapted from the Faris route of Steins;Gate Hiyoku Renri no Darling.

The "Golden Wizard" is the hero who saved a kingdom  and the "Silver Wizard" is the wicked mage who killed the king. One day  May  a baker's daughter living in the country where the legend of the two wizards was born  finds a grain of wheat in shining silver on the outskirts of town. What awaits her is a "silver wheat field" covered in shimmering stalks of silver wheat. This is a silvery fantasy woven by wizards.  (Source: GFantasy  translated)  --- Note: Originally a one-shot story published in GFantasy  it was picked up for full serialization by the magazine starting 2023-02-18.

In a world where the demon lord had been defeated and peace had arrived  Rex the magical doctor ran a clinic. But the patients brought in were all beyond saving compared to the world itself  people who'd XXX slimes or stuck their peens into man-eaters!? An otherworld perverted medical comedy begins!! ___ **Additional Links:** - **Alt Official Raw:** [niconico Manga](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/67171) - [Official X](https://x.com/magicdr_rex)

Hitori Gotou is a high school girl who's starting to learn to play the guitar because she dreams of being in a band  but she's so shy that she hasn't made a single friend. However her dream might come true after she meets Nijika Ijichi  a drummer girl looking for a new guitarist for her band.

In order to start a rebellion  Jiujin infiltrated the Western Region’s marriage convoy on its way through the central plains. But her cover was blown on the very first day. Fortunately for her  it appears that the princess she was escorting might also be a fake! Pursued by forces on all sides they must rely on each other to survive. Through close encounters and shared dangers  feelings gradually begin to blossom.

title_en: The Idol and Her Egg Problem
tags: Romance|Comedy|Self-Published|Drama|School Life|Fantasy|Monster Girls|Web Comic|Slice of Life|Full Color
description: A rising winged idol hides a secret: every month  like clockwork  Amirare lays a single  shimmering egg.   One day  just as Amirare tries to sneak away backstage in pain  she got caught in the act.

title_en: Chiikawa: Nanka Chiisakute Kawaii Yatsu (Webcomic Pages)
description: Follow the adventures of Chiikawa the innocent cute creature  Hachiware the kind cat  and Usagi the chaotic rabbit as they work their hardest to survive in a world filled with dangerous monsters  mysterious armored taskmasters  and fantastical phenomena at every turn!

title_en: Kutabire Salarymen no Ore  7nenburi ni Saikai shita Bishoujo JK to Dosei wo Hajimaru
description: Amae Yuuya  an office worker in his third year of employment  is completely exhausted by the daily grind. Then  for the first time in seven years  Yuuya meets Aoi Shiratori  a girl eight years younger than him who used to live in his neighborhood. She had grown up to be a beautiful JK girl who was good at housework  and she said to him   "Yuuya-kun  would you like to live with me under the premise of marriage?"  Aoi desperately wants to live with Yuuya  her first love. Yuuya  who is puzzled  agrees to live with Aoi as a guardian for the time being  but Aoi's aggressive approach makes him very nervous inside. ___ [Japanese Light Novel](https://firecross.jp/hjbunko/series/492)

After saving one world  warrior Kim Minsu returns to Earth only to find that he’s lost everything… so he decides to destroy the world he used to call home.  In his rampage  he kills teenager Jeongsu Park and his family. But instead of dying normally  Jeongsu is transported to another world  where he finds that he’s now a warrior himself. After killing the demon king of this alternate world and honing his skills as a warrior  Jeongsu returns to earth  hell-bent on revenge against Minsu.  As the two warriors fight with the fate of their country in the balance  who will emerge victorious?

title_en: Sekai wo Sukuu Tame ni Watashi to Asa Chun Dekimasu ka?
description: Humans and demihumans live together in peace  and in this world  there's a normal human named Hironori Tabata. One day  an angel named Suzuki Lina went out to find him and said she wants to have sex with him…the reason—? The Demon King will be resurrected in the future and Tabata's son will be the hero that will fight and defeat him.

While on his way home from an interview  unemployed  unmotivated  jaded 18-year-old Inumata Shinogi encounters the beautiful lady and evil spirit Yaergnacht Finsternis. She demands him to either marry her or die on the spot. He must command the battle against enemies of humanity  the apostles of God (Highlanders)  and save the world with his wife!! ___ **Alt Official Raw:** [Comic DAYS](https://comic-days.com/episode/2550912965944469925)

title_en: The Witch And Another World Girls

description: A new relationship begins after a seven year reunion!      After being separated for seven years between Hokkaido and Tokyo  a young man waits at the airport to reunite with his best friend. However  what arrives instead is a message from his best friend saying he will be late  and a mysterious beauty! The ever-spirited mangaka  Hiroki Ohara  makes his debut on Comic Newtype!

New shoujo manga artist Nana Futami works hard every day while being supported by Kaede Satou  her female editor who is older than her  and Mizuki Hazama  her assistant. According to the girl herself  she sometimes drums up intense daydream delusions of occupational illness!

title_en: Youngest Sister-in-Law in a Tragic Reverse Harem
description: One feverish night  6-year-old Liliana Bercchio suddenly recalls the plot of a tragic reverse harem novel. Unsure if she's been reincarnated or has time traveled  her young mind struggles to make sense of it all. Her family is doomed to get caught up in the protagonists' mess—but there's still time… or so she thought. When she witnesses the female lead's death and the deranged male leads appear before her sisters  the story takes a turn. They seem different now  but is her family truly safe?

title_en: Isekai Saikouhou no Guild Leader ~Guild Saijaku no Boku da Kedo  Guild Members Zen'in no ai ga Omokute Guild wo Yameraremasen~
description: I thought that if I reincarnated  I would be able to build a happy harem and be peerless in another world...!! The guild that was created on a whim has become the pinnacle guild of strong men. Moreover  except for me  everyone is handsome and beautiful. I'm the weakest in the guild... can I quit the guild now?

title_en: Namaiki na Gal Ane wo Wakaraseru Hanashi
description: Every time she opens her mouth  it's nothing but abusive language  and her problematic behavior never stops. The protagonist has had enough and sets a “plan” into motion…??!

Yeonwoo’s brother disappeared years ago  and he’s devastated to learn of his death.  As he copes with his loss  he’s given a pocket watch and learns there’s more to his brother’s death: he was betrayed while competing in the Tower of the Sun God.  Now it’s Yeonwoo’s turn to use the knowledge his brother left behind.  Can Yeonwoo navigate that world and gain enough power and experience to reach the top of the tower  defeating his brother’s enemies and all those who stand in his way?  ---  - [Alternative Raw (Kakao Webtoon)](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%91%90-%EB%B2%88-%EC%82%AC%EB%8A%94-%EB%9E%AD%EC%BB%A4/2335)
A huge incident happens to Arika  the center of a hugely popular idol group. Is the culprit a fan? Or could it be... The light and dark sides of the glamorous idol industry are now exposed!

description: Why torment scumbags for just a moment when you can do so forever? Join Su LuXia as she transmigrates into countless worlds with her ‘Supporting Female Character’s Counterattack System’ to unleash vengeance upon the deplorable male and female leads using a variety of tactics!   Su LuXia: "The only thing that brings me comfort is the tears of remorse from scumbag men and the agonizing groans of despicable women who can't get what they want."   System: "Has My Esteemed Host learnt to reel back her vengeful spirit? Nope  I guess not."

title_en: Boushoku no Berserk ~Ore dake Level to Iu Gainen wo Toppa suru~
description: In this world  there are two types of people. Those Who have powerful "skills"  and those who don't. People born with powerful skills  exterminate monsters to level up and become successful  while people without them  become failures  who are treated harshly by society. Follow the story of Fate  a guy who works as a gatekeeper  and whose only skill is gluttony  a skill that only makes him hungry.
About a boy who’s 14  who wants to destroy the world so he summons a demon but it’s not what he expects. He still strives to destroy the world in whole even with the inconveniences.

title_en: There won't be a next time

description: Shinobu Sumida  a down-on-his-luck gravure otaku  unexpectedly starts living together with rookie gravure idol Sakura Katsuragi! But his heart-racing dream days are short-lived as lecherous photographers  crooked managers  and sexually harassing producers start closing in on his “beloved Sakura-chan” one after another!! Can Shinobu protect Sakura-chan's virtue!?   From the creator of the hit series “Karamizakari” (over 4.5 million copies sold)  Airi Katsura presents this NTR romantic comedy featuring popular gravure idols♡

Bojji is a deaf  powerless prince who cannot even wield a children's sword. As the firstborn son  he strives hard and dreams of becoming the world's greatest king. However  people mutter about him behind his back with "a good-for-nothing prince" and "no way he can be king". Bojji is able to make his first ever friend  "Kage"  a literal shadow on the ground who somehow understands Bojji well. The story follows Bojji's coming of age as he meets various people in his life  starting with his fateful encounter with Kage. ___ **Additional Sites:** - [Official X](https://x.com/osama_ranking)
Akigai Kanisuke is an ordinary high school boy. His daily life changes when Mizuda Yuuko (a.k.a. Mizudako-chan)  a demi-human girl  transfers to his school.

"I'll be your friend."   A chilling ghost boy  Haesu Lee  visits the outcast  Eunha Joo. The moment she accepts this dangerous friendship  unexpected events unfold around Eunha...   Will this hand offered by her mysterious friend be salvation  or a curse?

title_en: Tensei Shitara Akari dake ga Slime Datta Ken
description: The Amusement Club gets transported to another world... and Akari turns into a slime.

Haruka Sakura wants nothing to do with weaklings—he's only interested in the strongest of the strong. He's just started at Furin High School  a school of degenerates known only for their brawling strength—strength they use to protect their town from anyone who wishes it ill. But Haruka's not interested in being a hero or being part of any sort of team—he just wants to fight his way to the top!

title_en: Ore Dake Yoyuu no Isekai Survival ~Tenisaki no Mujintou de Tanoshimu Harem Life~
description: Kaito Saejima  an eccentric boy with a passion for survival  is suddenly transported along with his classmates to a deserted island in another world. To survive in such a dangerous environment  he starts living together with the beautiful girls from his class and shows off his incredible survival skills like a true expert! A harem survival life where I’m the only one taking it easy and having a good time with gorgeous girls!

Gol D. Roger  a man referred to as the "Pirate King " is set to be executed by the World Government. But just before his demise  he confirms the existence of a great treasure  One Piece  located somewhere within the vast ocean known as the Grand Line. Announcing that One Piece can be claimed by anyone worthy enough to reach it  the Pirate King is executed and the Great Age of Pirates begins.      Twenty years later  a young man by the name of Monkey D. Luffy is ready to embark on his own adventure  searching for One Piece and striving to become the new Pirate King. Armed with just a straw hat  a small boat  and an elastic body  he sets out on a fantastic journey to gather his own crew and a worthy ship that will take them across the Grand Line to claim the greatest status on the high seas.  **Note:**   **Because a takedown notice was sent to MangaDex from the owners of this series  English fan translations of One Piece are unable to be posted at this time. The series can be read in its entirety at [the official Shonen Jump website ](https://www.viz.com/shonenjump/chapters/one-piece) with the first and latest three chapters available at any time and the rest accessible with a Shonen Jump membership (which costs about $2 a month and can be accessed via a VPN if you are outside the US).**

title_en: Goddess of Victory: Nikke - Ryousangata Nike x Sousaku Shikikan (Doujinshi)
description: A manga set in the NIKKE universe  this story takes place 100 years before the game story. The protagonist  Claude  is the commander of an all mass-produced NIKKE squad who sees them as more than easily replaced tools of war and tries to protect them and fight for their rights.

高校生の藤枝優月は、誰からも好かれる「優しい子」。 周囲の人――友達や彼氏のことを優先し、自分の本当の心を隠してしまう。 自分の「声」を出すことが得意じゃない。そんな「他人本位」が優月のこれまでの生き方だった。 そう、君に会うまでは――。  ある日、優月は道端でギターで弾き語りをする少女に出会う。その歌声が忘れられず、放課後の教室で一人で曲を口ずさんでいると、あの時の少女「寺田ひなた」が現れる。ひなたは、同じ高校に通う生徒だった。しかも、「未来からあんたを助けにきた」と話しかけてきて――!?  ガールミーツガール×学園アオハルストーリー!!
Shape-shifting wolf and rabbit couple            [Creator's weibo](https://weibo.com/u/2673967277)

title_en: The Yandere Sister Just Wants Me to Bully Her
tags: Reincarnation|Long Strip|Romance|Girls' Love|Drama|School Life|Fantasy|Web Comic|Full Color
description: The protagonist  who is a novelist  deeply detests women who appear innocent and pure but are manipulative  so she intentionally creates such a main character in her book and arranges for her to be mistreated repeatedly! However  she never imagined that one day she would end up transported into the book  and now she is determined to take personal revenge! But due to her tendency to fall in love with beauty  she cannot bring herself to harm the beautiful  innocent protagonist and  step by step  ends up becoming her guardian... While she is anxious about her misguided feelings  the ever-fragile protagonist pushes the male protagonist three meters away and confesses his love for Gu Xing in a stubborn way! What! So  after all  I'm the one being protected!  Source : MU

Kyouto  April 1928. Oshikouji Ryu is 17 years old  and is called 'Genius swordman  Dragon of Kyouto'. He will inherit the property of the noble Oshikouji family  but prefers practising Kendou. He enters a school for training Kendou swordman  but the seniors of school are very harsh and intolerable. But Ryu doesn't surrender and overcomes the problems  later on he impresses his seniors and they begin to like him.  This manga tells a great story against the richly textured background of historical Japan and China  it has a refined and excellent artwork. Murakami's views on Chinese and Korean people is very warm  and not those of the previous invader and governor such as the extreme right party in Japan. Another interesting part of the manga is its rich depiction of Japanese colorful life. A typical example of the realistic style and a manga of high reputation in Korea and Japan.

A sci-fi story about Captain Momo  a woman on board the space freighter Blue Chateau. She is alone on the 500-day one-way journey  accompanied by a cat  when she realizes that the electronic replication range that converts electrical energy into food can replicate non-food items as long as it has the data. The story depicts the freewheeling life of Captain Momo  who spends most of her time naked because she lives on a spaceship all by herself  and the serious troubles that occur during such a life.

title_en: The Blood Princess and the Knight
description: I  who was a sacred knight  was defeated and captured in a battle against the vampire clan.     "Oh? Letting you die? In your dreams! Accept my embrace  and in the future  please take care of me  my lovely daughter~"     The silver-haired Queen of the Vampire Clan lifted my chin and smiled cunningly  her sharp canines drawing closer to my neck…   --- **Links:** - [Alternative raw (Bilibili)](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc28199)

title_en: Kao dake yoi Classmate ga  Yatara to Guigui Kuru Yuri no Hanashi.
description: Ritsu Kaidou  a member of the top social caste at school  had a boyfriend—not out of love  but because it was what everyone expected. As their one-year anniversary approached  the moment finally came for their first kiss... But just then  Tsuzuru Yarai  a quiet classmate  happened to witness it all—!?

"A love that was supposed to be just a memory starts moving all at once!!"  Kanae Meguru  a movie enthusiast  had potential romantic interests throughout elementary  middle  and high school. However  due to his lack of experience in love  he was never able to take action. Learning from that  he vowed to focus entirely on his university film club activities  completely ignoring romance. But that resolve was short-lived—before he knew it  he found himself falling for Ootsuka Ozora  a girl he met in the film club...!?
Kujou is a lawyer who would even defend the Devil. In this new Reiwa Era where chaos is spreading  he's the “guardian of darkness” who operates behind the scenes.

Otaku Sakamichi Onoda has just entered high school and plans to join the anime club. In middle school  Onoda didn't have any friends with whom he could talk about anime  games  Akihabara and other otaku things  and he is hoping he can make such friends in the anime club  but he finds out it's been disbanded. In order to reestablish the club he tries to find 4 other people who would like to join.  Since he was a little boy  Onoda has ridden his mamachari–a bulky bicycle with a step-through frame mainly used for short rides  such as for casual fun or to pick up groceries–to go to Akihabara every week to check out or buy otaku things. Fellow freshman Shunsuke Imaizumi and bicyclist  while training  notices a boy (Onoda) riding his mamachari up a steep road.  Freshman and road racing cyclist  Shokichi Naruko visits Akihabara to get some Gundam plastic models for his younger brothers and meets Onoda who catches his attention because of the his cycling skill on the mamachari and later find out they go to the same school. Later on  both Naruko and Imaizumi try to convince him to join the bicycle racing club  but will he? ___ - **Won the Kodansha Manga Award for Shonen in 2015  which it shared with The Seven Deadly Sins** ___ Official Release: - Indonesian release by m&c! Comics as **Yowamushi Pedal  Go!**

Akira  a young yakitori shop owner  has fallen in love with Houka  a bunny girl who often eats at his restaurant. But how can he get close to her when he has to focus on the grill‽ And there are 4 other bunny girls that look just like her‽  **Note:** “Piccolina” is short for “Picco di Stellina”  which means “Starlet Peak” or “Peak of the Starlet” in Italian.

People have been created that are human-animal hybrids  and powerful businesses bet on the outcome of their duels. College student Nomoto Yuuya's casual acquaintances ask him to drive them around to pick up girls one day  which he soon finds out means by force. The girl they kidnap is an animal-human hybrid named Hitomi  who slaughters all of them except Yuuya. Hitomi is a honey badger  which has been called the most fearless of all animals. Now Hitomi is assigned to stay with Yuuya  for his protection! Killing Bites are underworld duels between human-animal hybrids. One beast who knows no fear will fight in this animalistic world full of fear and insanity.

title_en: Otonari no Oneesan ni Arekore sareru Manga
description: 22 year old Chia regularly stops by the apartment of her neighbor Kento every day. Kento is a third-year junior high school student who is often busy studying for exams. Chia's feminine charms keep tension with him whenever they are together.  A comedy about the age difference between a teenage boy and an older woman.

After tomboy Haedam is thoroughly friend zoned by her first love  she's determined to glow up before college. But when she makes the wrong impression on her first day of school  she realizes she needs the help of her reluctant neighbor. In exchange  she promises to put up with their living circumstances and keep his secret. What could possibly go wrong?

Ninja vs. Ninja!! A deathmatch to decide the strongest begins!! Kazama Endo  an unbeatable delinquent  goes to scope out Hachisuka Ichiya  a boy who roughed up his henchmen. Endo  who lives and dies by fights with strong opponents  comes expecting another brawl  but it turns out Ichiya is anything but ordinary...!! A bacchanalia of bad boys seeking to put themselves on top begins!! ___ **Additional Links:** - [Official X](https://x.com/rappa_yankee)

There exist in the world monsters called _Utsuro_  the favourite food of which is the bioenergy _nectar_  possessed by girls not yet of age. Despite belonging to an organisation called _The Garden_ that works to fight these monsters  Iruka Natsumi lives her life deathly afraid of being eaten by them. Yet then  a girl boasting overwhelming power appears before her! Will they reach the age of nineteen  or will they be eaten by the monsters first!?

tags: Time Travel|Monsters|Action|Long Strip|Adventure|Virtual Reality|Video Games|Fantasy|Web Comic|Adaptation|Full Color
description: After learning 15 miserable years of his life as a failed gamer was one long nightmare  Lee Eojin is glad to be a newbie again! Vowing not to repeat the same mistakes  Eojin starts anew as the hotshot  Stagnant Water.   He’s conquering monsters  getting sweet gear  and making enough dough to set himself up for life!   Loved by fans and hated by foes  both old and new  will Eojin break the game and triumph  or will the game break him once again?

After the sudden death of her father  24-year-old Reina Izutsu finds herself at the helm of the family business  Izutsu Printing. Thrust into the role of company president  the pressure quickly hardens her demeanor—leaving her employees walking on eggshells  especially Kenichi Ishizumi  the stoic 37-year-old section chief. One night  overwhelmed and tipsy in a quiet park  Reina blurts out  "That's it! I quit being everyone's boss!"—completely unaware that the man beside her is her employee. Under the soft glow of the stars  he listens silently... and makes a quiet vow to stand by her side.

"In this realm mythological creatures roam  descendant of the nine heavens they call home."   Sibuxiang  a mythical deer-man couch potato  is kicked out of heaven and assigned to support the mythological creatures wandering the human world. He meets and goes on adventures with his friends: the energetic  food loving Pixiu named Pipi  the fanatic moon bunny Tuye  the banished-from-heaven mouse brothers Jinjiao and Yinjiao  and many others. What kind of adventures will they take on?

Xue Zhao came looking for a missing woman in Chenjia Village. However  he learns that the village answers to a cult devoted to a forgotten Gu deity. Xue Zhao then tries to escape with his companions  but he soon realizes that there are even more terrifying  hidden secrets within the village. These unknown horrors go far beyond anything he could have imagined...

No matter how hard things seem to be  there is always 'someone' watching over you.  A ghost who remained in this world with lingering attachments  one day encountered an office worker left exhausted from work  Nozaki.  "Nobody even looks at me..."  Nozaki was consumed with loneliness. The ghost  who was all alone at the end of his own life  decided to watch over his daily life.  Though left at the mercy of his job  Nozaki desperately carried on each day. Until one day  he encountered someone new.  The feelings he lost amid the restless day-to-day  through connecting with others  Nozaki will gradually take back.
