A bitter and painful adult's life needs "friends".  Set in a game company  Rihito Otsuka (23)  who is your everyday salaryman  and Noa Saotome (27)  the ultimate career woman. Two characters whose lives aren't supposed to intersect become "friends" by chance. ___ **Links:**  - [Alternative Raw (Ch15 Continue Here)](https://ynjn.jp/allEpisodeList/10427)
Oneshot

No one could ever come close to “Battle God” Ye Qiu’s skills in Glory  a popular game that took the world by storm. His professional team  however  replaced him with another captain  and even seized his account.  He was left to start anew at an internet café as a manager. When a new District 10 opened up in Glory  he dives back  armed with a decade of experience and an unfinished custom weapon.  His path to redemption  filled with strategy and memories  marks his thrilling return to the summit.  ---  ***Note:*** This is a webcomic rerun of [The King's Avatar](https://mangadex.org/title/83d08adf-6118-4859-a0e7-082f3707604b).  Alternative Official English Translation: [Webnovel](https://www.webnovel.com/comic/the-king's-avatar_17959825305729101)

This is a continuation of the story of Higanjima : featuring an isolated island  inhabited by warring vampires and humans  and surrounded by aquatic demons that foil any attempts at entry or escape that are not explicitly authorised by their vampiric overlord   Miyabi.       Ryousuke  his girlfriend Kazumi  and his friend Yamaoka are shipwrecked by the demons  and wash up on the shore of Higanjima. They soon experience the monstrous cruelty of the island's vampires first-hand but  luckily  Ryousuke is able to join up with the human resistance.       His only desire is to leave Higanjima…however  mainland Japan may not be safe for long either. If the vampiric threat is not eradicated in 47 days  then Miyabi's machinations will transform it into yet another vampire island!

Kaede Yuzuki is Kouhei Aida's new neighbor  both at home and in the classroom. Kouhei tries to be friendly with Kaede  but their conversations lead nowhere. But then one day… ___ [Official X Account](https://twitter.com/kyo_osa0420)

title_en: The Demon Maid Only Wants to Be Bullied by the Villainess Noble Lady
description: The Noble Lady binds Tentacle Maid  Sharan  a pious girl  has secured a well-paying job as a maid. Her mission is to serve a prideful  sadistic noble lady named Lynette. However  her job won't simply be that easy....
20 timelines that diverged from DBZ meet in a multiverse tournament! This ignores DBS.

In a world where technology and magic are almost indistinguishable from one another  monsters and creatures of myth and legend reign terror upon mankind. In humanity’s darkest moment  individuals with special god-like powers emerge to save the day. They are — the Awakened.  Meet Jaehyeon  a feeble Awakened human Raider  who struggles to make ends meet until one day a series of confounding events allow him to claim a powerful item that will change the course of history forever…

White Tiger went into the woods to find a strong tiger called "Black Tiger" and met Black Tiger  the shrimp.  It's a web manga on Twitter by NITORI Sasami  the author of "Wonder Cat Kyuu-chan" (Fushigi Neko no Kyuu-chan).
As demons start creeping in through the Witches' Quarter  its protector must rise to the occasion and stop them from invading the human world.

Shuuhei  a reporter for a trashy tabloid magazine  becomes obsessed with Nao-kun  a mysterious amateur ghost-hunting streamer who secretly works as a camboy on the side - and after he attempts to meet Nao in real life  things take a turn for the bizarre when he tries to understand more about the lonely  slutty boy.

Aoi Ashito is a third year middle school student from Ehime. Behind his raw game hides his immense talent  but Ashito suffers a huge setback because of his overly straightforward personality. One day the youth team manager of J1 club Tokyo City Esperion  Fukuda Tetsuya  appears in front of him. Fukuda sees his limitless potential and invites him to take part in his team's tryouts in Tokyo. ___ - **Won the 65th Shogakukan Manga Award for General Manga in 2019.**

“Dawn” entered the hall with her calm movements and stood in the middle. Her face showed no emotions  like a doll  but she was captivating and elegant  strikingly like an ice queen. Exer smiled lightly  spread her legs  and said  ‘As Lord  I will embrace you tonight.’ A fateful encounter for the first time. A woman falls in love at first sight. And a man fights the world for this woman. ‘If this world cannot accept her as a wife  then I will change this world.’ A love story between Dawn  the Eastern girl who endured a tough childhood while fleeing from war and became a slave  and Exer  the handsome man who was known as the strongest warrior in the kingdom.  --- Arrogant Duke Ixor Malkuth is used to getting absolutely everything he wants... until he meets the beautiful Daon  a slave who refuses to give in to his demands. As the conquerer of Daon's territory  Ixor tries to treat her like his mistress  but when she runs away  he decides to charm her into loving him. Yet with every attempt to seduce her  Ixor finds himself slowly falling for her instead. Will the prideful duke succeed in stealing Daon's affection  or will he find his own heart conquered?

title_ja: Dore ga Koi ka ga Wakaranai
description: Our protagonist  Soraike Mei  confessed her unrequited love to her friend at the high school graduation ceremony... That was the plan  at least. Her confession was a failure. Because of that  she is keen to "Definitely get a girlfriend during college!" But for some reason  one woman after another keeps on approaching her?!

title_en: Yuusha Party kara Oidasareta Fuguushoku [Wanashi] Yunikku Sukiru [Yajirushi] de Saikyou ni Naru
description: "That’s why... as of today  you're out of the party."  Forty years have passed since dungeons began appearing across the world. Keiichiro  a member of an elite S-rank adventurer party  is suddenly expelled by his childhood friend for being "too weak." His job  Trapper  is seen as useless—after all  it lacks any offensive abilities. Stripped of his future as an adventurer  Keiichiro sinks into despair—until he encounters a mysterious girl who grants him a unique skill.  The skill  Arrow  shatters the limitations of a Trapper  transforming him into an unstoppable force. Determined to reclaim his place as an adventurer  Keiichiro embarks on a journey to become the strongest!

Kinokura Gen loves camping solo. He enjoys the quiet solitude away from the hustle and bustle of the city  and being able to appreciate nature all by himself. But on one camping trip  his solitude is broken by the appearance of Kusano Shizuku  a young woman who wanted to go solo camping by herself  but is ill-prepared and completely out of her league. While he tries to to get her to go home so he can camp in peace  she refuses  and stubbornly insists on accompanying him on future camping trips until she's ready to camp solo. ___ **Note**: "Part 1" concluded in February 2023 with 3 extra chapters due to start in April as the series is moving magazines from Kodansha Evening to Kodansha Morning.  The series resumed its publication in December 2023.

title_en: Shouwaru Tensai Osananajimi to no Shoubu ni Makete Hatsutaiken o Zenbu Ubawareru Hanashi
description: A twisted girls' love story featuring: A devilish girl hiding behind the mask of an honor student x An ordinary girl who hates losing.  Wakaba Yoshizawa has a childhood friend named Komaki Umezono.  This girl wore the mask of an honor student with good morals who's blessed with both beauty and brains  but in reality she's an evil genius who looked down on people. For the sake of regaining the dignity she lost to Komaki  Wakaba challenges her to a match  but Komaki tells her "Each time I win  I will take one precious thing from you." as a condition!? Every time she loses to the girl she "hates"  her true feelings get exposed.  (Source: Young Ace Up)
(from ebookjapan):Miake Kousei  a man who brings out the "beauty" and "love" hidden in everyone  arrives at the grand stage! This is the rumored debut work by the genius Keisuke Itagaki!

One day  Haruhi  a scholarship student at exclusive Ouran High School  breaks an $80 000 vase that belongs to the "Host Club " a mysterious campus group consisting of six super-rich (and gorgeous) guys. To pay back the damages  she is forced to work for the club  and it's there that she discovers just how wealthy the boys are and how different they are from everybody else. [Viz]

title_en: Boku Ni Wa Onee-Chan Ga Sannin Imasu (Jisshitsu)

description: Flora moves into a mysterious mansion and finds it inhabited by a strange creature—Creepy Cat! Thus begins her strange and sometimes dangerous life with a feline roommate. This Gothic comedy brings the chuckles…and the chills!  Source: Seven Seas Entertainment

Aizawa Kakeru is an energetic and dedicated eighth grader who serves as the manager for his school’s football team. Though he was well known for being a talented player the previous year  an accident during one of his games caused Kakeru to vow never to play competitively again. Still passionate about the sport  Kakeru dreams of one day becoming a professional football trainer so that he can work alongside his older brother Suguru  the ace of the school team who has represented Japan in international competition.      Link:   [AnimeNewsNetwork](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=13559) (anime).

title_en: Kimi no Sei Nan Dakara  Sekinin Totte yo ne.
description: I'm an office lady  and a part-time rental girlfriend. I'm good at getting along with people and can do anything. I'm not particularly interested in romance right now  but I imagine I'll get married and have kids someday...  Then I met Sui-chan  my first rental girlfriend client. At first  I was hesitant because we're the same sex and she's younger than me... but then I thought  wow  I'm good with women too!?

title_en: Seikishi ni Natta kedo Danchou no Oppai ga Sugosugite Kokoro ga Kiyomerarenai
description: The aspiring sword master  Ruga  was chosen to join the Order of the Holy Knights due to his sincerity and swordsmanship prowess. He is assigned to the Sixth Order  rumored to be a "living hell " and prepares himself for tough times. However  he ends up meeting the big-breasted Commander  Leon Myrie  who says "Welcome  Ruga. You are the only male knight of the Sixth Order." Looking at his right  he saw big breasts  at his left  beautiful women! Will Ruga's reason last in the face of this inescapable Order?!

Kokoro Kosaka is shocked when her recently deceased classmate comes back to life in the form of a stuffed wallaby toy! How will she handle this new companion and what are his reasons for returning from the dead?

tags: Romance|Comedy|Girls' Love|Doujinshi|School Life|Vampires|Web Comic|Slice of Life|Adaptation
description: **Alt Official Raw:** [note](https://note.com/girls_vampire)

Nie Li became the strongest Demon Spiritualist and stood at the pinnacle of the martial world. However  he lost his life during the battle with the Sage-Emperor and six deity-ranked beasts.      His soul was then brought back to when he was still 13 years old. At this point in his life  Nie Li was considered to be the most pathetic of his peers. However  with the vast knowledge he accumulated from his previous life (his future)  he began becoming stronger faster than anyone could expect. He also decided to help those who died nobly in his previous life become stronger as well.      Aiming to avert the future destruction of his home by demon beasts  and to avoid his previous fate of ending up destroyed  Nie Li fights to protect his lover  friends  family and fellow citizens who died in the beast assault or its aftermath. He also aims to destroy the so-called "sacred family " who will abandon their duty and betray the city.

[Translated by Mystic Willow Scans] As Lee Yeo-ju hums a song that comforted her during her long hospital stay  she is approached by an idol star named Park Jae-ha  whom she has only seen in videos. "I'll help you. You need money for the surgery  right?" Jae-ha becomes Yeo-ju's savior and favorite. However  five years later  he ends his life by making an extreme choice... Yeo-ju  in shock  cries out to a shooting star to save him. Did her wish come true? She goes back seven years and possesses the body of Jang Bo-ran  a top idol at the time and a judge on the audition program "I Am the Strongest Idol"... Among the audition participants is trainee Park Jae-ha!"Just like you saved me  I will save you this time."

title_en: Otonari no Tenshi-sama ni Itsunomanika Dame Ningen ni Sareteita Ken
description: Amane Fujimiya’s neighbor in the apartment he lives in is the school’s number one lovable angel: Excellent and with a level of beauty that can only be described as angelic – Mahiru Shiina. Amane  an ordinary student who doesn’t stand out  is her neighbour  but until now  they didn’t interact with each other. After meeting the soggy angel in the rain:       “I’m returning what I borrowed. By the way  clean up your room. It’s filthy.”    “None of your business.”       A relationship with a slightly sharp-tongued angel begins  starting with handing over an umbrella. From catching a cold and having someone take care of you  to making a meal for someone because they neglected their health  to joint work (cleaning rooms)…'      This is a short comic intended to only introduce the light novel. The serialization of the actual manga will be done by 三描子 and 優木すず.

title_en: Konjiki no Word Master - Yuusha Yonin ni Makikomareta Unique Cheat
description: In an RPG-like fantasy world consumed by warring nations and racial discrimination  the human kingdom summons five high school students from 21st-century Japan for assistance in their conflict with the demonkin. Now those students  with their experience of MMORPGs at their disposal  will hone their skills to protect the human kingdom of Edea.      However  this isn't their story.      Out of the five students  four of them were given the title of Hero and the fifth one the title of Innocent Bystander. He had been summoned by accident since he sat near the other four students. His name is Hiiro Okamura  an aloof bookworm with traveling and reading as his raison d'etre. Hiiro sees no reason to help the human kingdom in their offensive war with the demonkin  seeing that he isn't a Hero and that he has no real obligation to help them  and decides to leave the kingdom to go on his own adventure.      Soon  Hiiro finds out that he has the very unique skill of Word Magic: magic that can materialize the definition of a word. As he travels more and more  he finds many uses for his Word Magic and many opportunities to find books  level up  and gain some of his own companions. Even with the outbreak of war on the horizon  Hiiro stays true to his desire to travel the new world he's in.

tags: Award Winning|Romance|Comedy|4-Koma|School Life|Web Comic|Slice of Life|Supernatural|Full Color
description: Nakano-san is a high school girl who can look into people's minds. Because of that  she finds out that the mind of the popular Toda-kun is full of wild fantasies about her! Or is it?

title_en: S-kyuu Guild wo Tsuihousareta kedo  Jitsu wa Ore dake Dragon no Kotoba ga Wakaru no de  Kidzuita Toki ni wa Ryuu Kishi no Chouten wo Kiwametemashita.
description: Cyril was expelled from the top-class dragon knight group  S-class guild "Lindwurm"  for certain reasons. However he has a hidden skill... the unconventional ability of being able to "communicate" with dragons!   After meeting and partnering with several unique dragons  Cyril starts his own guild. Perhaps due to his incredible talent  the guild's level soars at the fastest rate in history! Cyril's skills are finally recognized  and he makes a name for himself as an extraordinary dragon knight! ___ **Character Designer:** [Pairan](https://mangadex.org/author/2dff3aac-5474-4044-bb73-3bfb86667515)  **Additional Links:** - Alt Official Raw: [niconico Manga](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/56371)
A 4-koma featuring super-deformed versions of the cast of Zero no Tsukaima.

The setting is a certain kingdom. In order to save the kidnapped princess of the kingdom  the Kingsguard squadron challenges the "Dragon Tower"  a gigantic structure floating in the middle of the sky  but they are blocked by powerful demons. A provocation is made by a neighboring village to replenish the injured personnel  and when a young man is sent to the tower  the wheel of fate begins to turn. ___ **Alt Official Raw:** [Comic DAYS](https://comic-days.com/episode/14079602755364316216) **Official English:** [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10604/episode/353121) - United States  Japan  Canada  Australia  New Zealand  Singapore  Philippines  Thailand  Vietnam  Hong Kong  Taiwan  India  Mexico  and Brazil only.

title_en: Shy na Ano Ko ni Natsukaretai
description: “*My seatmate  Shiraishi-san  is just too cute—and it's driving me crazy!*”  They know each other  but they’re not exactly friends. Akaogi Ayame and Shiraishi Konomi are classmates—*nothing more  nothing less.* Ayame is strikingly beautiful  a standout athlete  and popular in class  whilst Konomi is shy  introverted  and has only one friend. They should’ve had no reason to interact... so how did things end up this way? What started as a small  trivial incident caused Ayame’s hidden feelings to overflow  now she can’t stop thinking about *her!*

Rapunzel is a young girl who lives atop a tall tower and knows nothing of the outside world. One day she meets a boy named Mikel  who climbs the tower  and their destiny to change the world begins to unfold!

title_en: You Woke up as a Girl This Morning!?
description: [Reads Left-to-Right]  It's a very common occurrence.

At the beginning of the academic year  Saotome Hodaka enrolls into Moteshiro Prefectural High School  a former all-girls school that had recently integrated  but discovers it has a male to female ratio of 1:359! While most might think of this as a paradise  the majority of the students are delinquents and Saotome immediately finds himself being extorted by some of the more aggressive girls. However  he is inadvertently saved by Hanako Kuzuryu  a beautiful delinquent who just wants to be left alone. Is this the start of a new friendship? And how will Saotome's life unfold in a school full of troublesome women?

Heian period Japan. The Fujiwara family is plotting to seize power at the court  when two maids suddenly go missing from the capital. The emperor fears that it is the work of a demon  and orders Ariwara no Narihira to work with a young man. The boy's name is Sugawara no Michizane.    Sugawara no Michizane  a shut-in student  and Ariwara no Narihira  a Kyoto playboy  are twenty years apart in age. They are different in status and birth  yet work together to solve the mysteries of Kyoto!

title_en: Con Cafe Jou wa Koi wo Kiru
description: Our protagonist  Aisaka Tsumugu  is an aspiring fashion designer leading a quiet student life  when one day in Kabukichou  she runs into a con cafe waitress  changing her life. She now spends her days in an entirely different exciting new place.

She is a girl that everyone loves but she cannot speak of the love she has for her brother because her brother already loves someone else. In despair  she gets dragged into Ancient Egypt by a snake shaped bracelet that is engraved with a three thousand year old love oath. There  she meets the Pharoah's heir  a party boy….

title_en: Mori no Asagao - Shinjin Keimukan to Aru Shikeishuu no Monogatari
description: A work which highlights the “present” of the capital punishment system through Oikawa Naoki  a newly recruited prison officer  who faces condemned criminals everyday and agonizes. Based on close and careful research  the author tackles with the serious theme of the “capital punishment system” head-on.  Won the 11th Japan Media Arts Festival Grand Prize for Manga.

In an era where Necromancers create their own knights to fight  "War of the Corpses" is the ultimate sport. Amidst a brutal battle where countless people pour their passion and dreams into the fight  who will emerge as the final victor?

"Please bury me " the boy said before their eyes even met  and ever since then  he has been seeing that boy everywhere - on the way to work  at the restaurant  at home - asking if he would bury him.  He is afraid. He is terrified. But not because there's clearly something wrong with all of this.  It's because he remembers.  He knows there's a reason the boy is asking him this. There's nothing strange about it.  "Please  bury me?" the boy asks again.

Hopeless pushover Iruma Suzuki has found himself in a devil of a predicament... His trashy parents have sold off his soul  and he now has to live and attend school in the Netherworld. But with his unique survival skills and doting demon grandfather’s support  Iruma will surely make it through this hellish experience. He'll just need to subjugate rival classmates  summon familiars  and more  all while never revealing that he's human... Easy as *aleph  bet  gimel*  right?

In Tokyo  suspicious cases are occurring where the victims have all of their blood drained from them. Mikogami Keiji  a detective who also wants revenge for his lover  killed 10 years ago  pursues the culprit  the “Man with two faces”. What is the identity of the silver-haired girl who observes him…? ___ **Assistant:** [Hoshikawa Danpa](https://mangadex.org/author/3814dd6f-c7b9-4ced-a9ee-a393eb4c06a7)
He got a cute girlfriend who was the first in his life  but her friend tempted him with a body that was lewder than her... What would you do if your girlfriend's friend pressed you like this?

In a world where beastmen stand on top of humans  OL Saki continues to struggle to lose. Saki endured the days of power harassment from her boss  but one day she was suddenly called by the company president  Atlas. I'll do my best!

tags: Time Travel|Monsters|Action|Demons|Long Strip|Martial Arts|Adventure|Magic|Fantasy|Web Comic|Supernatural|Full Color
description: "An opportunity's an opportunity  no matter how slimy these gods who grant them may be. If they want a show  I'll give them one!"  Zephyr is the last human fighting evil in a world abandoned by the gods. When he is killed in battle by Tartarus  the god of destruction  all hope for humanity seems lost.  But Zephyr's fate is not sealed - the gods who find his battles entertaining have gifted him a second chance at life  as he is sent ten years into the past  back to when he was a slave instead of the most powerful human alive.  Can Zephyr get his revenge against Tartarus and save the woman he loves  or is he doomed to repeat the past?  --- [Webtoon PV](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BOqe_XcNCBo)  **Original Webtoon:** [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=6325420)  [Naver Webtoon](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list?titleId=774044)  **Official Translations:** * [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/doushenzhuanshengji/list?title_no=1766) * [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/action/doombreaker/list?title_no=3126) * [French / Français](https://www.webtoons.com/fr/fantasy/doom-breaker/list?title_no=3323) * [German / Deutsch](https://www.webtoons.com/de/action/doom-breaker/list?title_no=3406) * [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://www.webtoons.com/id/fantasy/doom-breaker/list?title_no=3217) * [Japanese / 日本語](https://manga.line.me/periodic/tag_item_list?tag_id=1014363&t=1657211210896) * [Spanish / Español](https://www.webtoons.com/es/action/doom-breaker/list?title_no=3342) * [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://www.webtoons.com/th/fantasy/battle-god/list?title_no=3190)

A few years have passed since Goku first met Uub  he's become satisfied that Uub is becoming stronger while he trains him so decides to take him to the next Tenkaichi Budokai tournament in order to test him.      In the background  a mysterious adversary from a different universe  Universe 0 (This was long before Dragon Ball Super) wants to return to our universe. In order to achieve that task  he requires the power of the Dragon Balls  and has revived Babidi in order to accomplish that goal.      Babidi soon awakens the remnants of Majin Buu sleeping deep within Uub and turns him into his puppet. Now it's up to Goku and Co. to stop this new adversary from crossing over into their universe at all costs!

RENAISSANCE  LIFE  DEATH  ASTRAL DISINTEGRATION. RENAISSANCE  LIFE  DEATH  ASTRAL DISINTEGRATION. RENAISSANCE  LIFE  DEATH  ASTRAL DISINTEGRATION.  All beings in the firmament live locked in this infinite cycle. Or so it was until the day they came down from the heavens.  Humanity ceased to be human. Death is no longer the end. Enlightenment came to save her children and defeat the most powerful feeling that consciousness had been able to create.  ___  SpaceDrum shows us a society that has evolved to a state of full well-being  freed from wars and conflicts  in search of Nirvana  thanks to the spiritual guidance of an alien race. The aryas are an elite group charged with the external security of the planet and the protection of the high priestess.  They are chosen because  thanks to their control over their Virya  they are able to control mysterious fragments  the shards. Reda is a student at one of the most distinctive military academies  but he has difficulty controlling his special shard due to constant visions of a strange young woman. And this will not be the biggest of your problems...

Three hundred years ago  he was know as the great Martial Emperor  but the night before his wedding he was betrayed and killed by his fiancee; three hundred years later he is reborn  and this time nothing will be able to stop him from his goal to dominate the three realms!!!

title_en: Baki Hanma - Son of Ogre (Shinsoban Release)
description: The climax of the Baki series  "Hanma Baki"  newly re-edited! Yujiro Hanma  the world's strongest creature  vs. Baki Hanma  the world's strongest high schooler... A spat between father and son on an unprecedented scale begins here!

After being reborn for the umpteenth time  7-month-old Lee Seojun finally gets the chance to fulfill his original dream of becoming a superstar actor! Using magic abilities from his past lives  baby Seojun captivates his playmates and becomes an overnight sensation with a viral mukbang video that helps fussy kids eat. Soon  he's shooting a baby food commercial  and his uncle's entertainment company is knocking at his door... but will Seojun be able to keep up the magic to match the demand?

20 nights  20 terrifying stories. Masaya Hokazono tells us the horrific stories he has experienced as well as those that have been told to him. Even in a technologically advanced modern Japan  traditional spirits never cease to torment the living.  Included oneshots: Volume 1: Hanashicha Ikenai (Don't Tell)  Kengai Imouto Kaidan (Out of Bounds: Sister Ghost Story) [Story: Kihara Hirokatsu]
A 4-Koma Ts comics of The typical Cliche where the Mc's Bestfriend turns into a girl one day.

From Maiu Cafe : Ameli  a model student and class representative in her first year of high school  has her world turned upside down after a month of classes when her secret is uncovered by Haruka  a second-year student with a devilish charm !  Amelia... What’s really hidden behind that pseudonym ?

Shoma Yusa  a new kid who moved to Tokyo with his sister  learns how to make friends through Dueling and creating Structure Decks.      *This series is based on the real life Yu-Gi-Oh! OCG (Official Card Game  known in the west as TCG) and how to build the best deck  based on the latest rule- and banlist.*

title_en: Umareta Chokugo ni Suterareta kedo  Zensei ga Taikensha datta node Yoyuu de Ikitemasu ~Saikyou Akachan Daibousou~
description: Born to excellent parents  Leus is abandoned shortly after being born due to a mismeasurement of magical aptitude. However  he was a super baby who had the memory and ability of his previous life where he was touted as a Great Sage  and was able to fly  not to mention conversation and walking! Adventuring with the sacred dragon familiar  Lindworm  enjoy the life of a baby Sage who becomes a person and enjoys freedom!

After rampant bullying  high school boy Takeshi Hirota kills himself and is transported to another another world  where he is accepted by the orcs due to his appearance. ___ **Alt Official Raw:** [MangaHot Web](https://web.mangahot.jp/works/detail.php?work_code=z_R0185) **Alt Official English:** [Comikey](https://comikey.com/comics/revenge-of-the-pig-manga/803/)

A young high school couple out on a date saw what looked like a falling meteorite  and inside  they discovered a little baby girl! The two of them married and adopted the girl  who they named Morumo  as their own. The only problem with this feel-good story is that now  as a high school freshman  Morumo is 16.4 meters tall!      Morumo still has a pretty happy life. She's popular with locals and tourists alike  and she goes to school everyday with her childhood friend Miharu. Then one day  a mad scientist  who specializes in experimenting on young ladies  injects Morumo with a serum that reduces her to 1/10 of her normal size. Her weight remains the same  so she is super-dense and tough like a superhero. Suddenly  it seems like all the joys of an ordinary life are within her grasp!! Sadly  the serum's effects are temporary and soon Morumo returns to her giant state.      But now that she knows a normal life is possible  Morumo is not going to give up! Even if it means she and Miharu have to allow a mad scientist to experiment on her  surely the ends will be worth the means!

A boy went to take his trash out late one night  and found a strange  creepy  gothic-lolita-dressed woman sitting amongst the garbage bags. She asked if he had a little sister  and he answered her  hurrying afterwards back to his apartment. When he looked out the window  she was gone. Who is the strange woman  and why does she give him such a bad feeling?

tags: Traditional Games|Girls' Love|School Life|Web Comic|Full Color|Gyaru
description: Two female classmates engage in a playful game challenge involving games such as poker  shogi etc... with the loser forced to fulfill embarrassing requests. Confident at first  one girl quickly loses each round  leading to increasingly awkward and funny situations.

Basketball players. Bad boys who aren’t really bad boys. Roommates. Senpai-kouhai BL romance. It all started when Kagiura moved into the school dorms with what seemed to be a bad-boy upperclassman. But after he’s left in the tender care of his mother hen of a roommate  Hirano  it’s too much to ask for Kagiura not to fall in love…right?!

Your body is their business!  Five young students at a Buddhist university  three guys and two girls  find little call for their job skills in today's Tokyo... among the living  that is! But all that stuff in college they were told would never pay off — you know  channeling  dowsing  ESP — gives them a direct line to the dead... the dead who are still trapped in their corpses and can't move on to the next reincarnation.  The five form the *Kurosagi* ("Black Heron"  their ominous bird logo) *Corpse Delivery Service*: whether suicide  murder  accident  or illness  they'll carry your body wherever it needs to go to free your soul! The kids from Kurosagi can smell a customer a mile away — it's a good thing one of the girls majored in embalming!

title_en: Tomodachi Nchi No Nechan Ga Kowakute Ii Hito
description: Satomi Yuuki  a high school boy  stops by his friend's house on his way home from school. He came over to study for a test  but he's instantly intimidated by his friend's older sister. With her flashy hair  glittering nails  and tons of piercings  she looks seriously scary.  However  she ends up making him Calpis  saying  "Gotta have sugar if you're gonna study " and even serves him handmade curry for dinner. One way or another  the sister keeps looking out for him.  This is a story depicting a pure-hearted teenage boy being constantly flustered by his friend's "Scary But Nice" older sister.

In New Pantheon City  monstrous "Voids" have plagued the people for over 500 years.   However  they are not without their protectors - Immortal Magical guardians are also there to fight back against them.  Living in New Pantheon City is Mars Hino - a troubled outcast. Because of his reputation  vulgar personality  and lack of social finesse  he has found himself entering high school alone. That is before he meets the hero of the Blunbell district  the magical girl Scarlet Star - who chooses him for a higher duty

title_en: Vampire Savior: The Soul's Lost Child
description: In the world of Makai  there are horrible monsters that humans fear  called Darkstalkers. Lillith  a fellow Darkstalker  falls to Earth (London) and befriends John. What will he do when he finds out what she is? Will Lillith survive Master Jedah's attacks??      Based on the Vampire Savior installment  from the DarkStalkers video game series produced by CAPCOM.

title_en: Boku wa Ai o Shoumei Shiyou to Omou.
description: In love and romance  it's all about TECHNOLOGY  and TECHNOLOGY always wins. Watanabe is a young 26-year-old lawyer who fervently believes in pure love and would give everything for his beloved girlfriend. However  reality makes him realize that love isn't the fantasy he's always dreamed of  but rather a game of probabilities and intelligence. Together with Watanabe  you'll learn the latest technology that will make you irresistible to any woman: “Love Engineering”.

title_en: Moto Maou-sama no Nangoku Slow Life - Buka ni Uragirareta no de  Mofumofu-tachi to Tanoshiku Slow Life suru no Ja
description: Ragurindo Jenerufu Korasoda  the overworked Demon Queen  had enough. After an assassination attempt and a betrayal by her underlings  she faked her death and escaped to a tropical paradise. There  among palm trees and beaches  she found a herd of adorable  fluffy slime creatures. Life as an ex-Demon Queen had never been so sweet.

On a night out drinking to get over being duped and ditched by her last boyfriend  Minare Koda ends up providing a massive drunken rant for Matou  the director of a radio station. The next day  she is shocked to hear her own voice being broadcast on the radio! She rushes to the studio  leaving her job at a curry soup and bread restaurant in jeopardy. However  her drunken rant and the next day's impromptu damage-control live broadcast end up earning her an invitation to try working at the radio station!

tags: Monsters|Animals|Long Strip|Magical Girls|Adventure|Magic|Fantasy|Web Comic|Slice of Life|Cooking|Supernatural|Adaptation|Full Color
description: After training for 11 years to reach superhuman status  I gave up on my dream and returned to the family farm. But suddenly  Hawa appeared! She’s a powerful farming spirit who can make anything grow—even produce that enhances people’s powers. Now I’ve got my superhuman ID card  more spirits-friends  mouthwatering Grade A+ crops  and quests! Will Hawa and her friends lead us all to fame and fortune and change our lives forever?

title_en: Blue Archive - Problem Solver 68 Business Diary
description: From the smash hit smartphone game "Blue Archive" comes the debut of Problem Solver 68 as our protagonist in this spin-off comic!! Please enjoy the comedic story of our four Problem Solvers in Kivotos - The Academic City!

title_en: Partners in Crime  Partners in Love
description: Lin Yan  a cold and arrogant female forensic expert  meets Song Yuhang  a righteous and sharp female detective. From being incompatible to becoming friends  they witness the lives of many ordinary people along the way: a young girl who struggles to survive but dies innocently  an old mother who waits for her criminal son to return in the mountains  a timid policeman who faces a gun-wielding robber bravely... They fight for the rights of the living  speak for the dead  and vow to uncover the truth that has been silent for years.

A Twitter series about a handsome salaryman and an unapproachable office lady who dress completely different when they are off work.  --- **Links:** - Alternative Official Raw - [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/user/4729811/series/198059)

tags: Long Strip|Romance|Office Workers|Girls' Love|Drama|Web Comic|Full Color
description: After her parents divorced  Lu Yang moved into her mother's good friend's house and began living with the friend's daughter  Su Gui. Su Gui is smart and gentle  like the warm sun in winter  kind yet unobtrusive. She illuminates Lu Yang's life and shines into Lu Yang's heart. Lu Yang saw her as a sister  a friend  and a mother figure... Later on  Lu Yang didn't want to be her little sister anymore  she wanted to date her. However  after realizing that her feelings for Su Gui had changed  Lu Yang did not want to ruin their current relationship. She was afraid to lose her identity as "little sister". She had to change her dependence on Su Gui and distance herself. But after reuniting with Su Gui at work  the suppressed feelings bloomed like a rose  tightly binding Lu Yang and Su Gui together. Was it a long-term scheme or destiny?...

title_en: Otoko Girai na Bijin Shimai wo Namae mo Tsugezu ni Tasuketara Ittai Dounaru?
description: Arisa and Aina are beautiful sisters who are famous for their dislike of men. Hayato  a classmate who happened to be involved with the two  will receive "special treatment" from the girls who are supposed to hate men―?!   "I want to be a slave to Hayato-sama..." "I want to fall in love and conceive his child." ___ **Character Designer:** [Giuniu](https://mangadex.org/author/657f488c-ba3d-4910-8ec3-539871b99fcc)

title_en: The Fragrant Flower Blooms with Dignity
description: In a certain place  there are two neighboring high schools. Chidori High School  a bottom-feeder boys' school where idiots gather  and Kikyo Girls' School  a well-established girls' school. Rintaro Tsumugi  a strong and quiet second year student at Chidori High School  meets Kaoruko Waguri  a girl who comes as a customer while helping out at his family's cake shop. Rintaro feels comfortable spending time with Kaoruko  but she is a student at Kikyo Girls  a neighboring school that thoroughly dislikes Chidori High. ___ **Links:** - [Official Twitter (JP)](https://twitter.com/kaoruhana_mp) - Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10023/episode/320130) (U.S. Only | Simulpub)

Akira Hatsushiba is just your typical  average high school kid . . . until a glitch in a Gacha Gacha video game changes his life forever. Now  every time Akira sneezes  his entire body undergoes a gender-bending switcheroo! That’s right  Akira is always just an achoo away from getting in touch with his feminine side. But it’s not all bad. Akira has had a crush on Yurika Sakuraba ever since he first laid eyes on her. He’s always been too shy  but now that he can change into a girl  Akira finally has a chance to get close to Yurika. Being a girl certainly has its advantages!      Part Two and Volumes 6-16 of Gacha Gacha.    Part One is known as Gacha Gacha - Capsule and ran as Volumes 1-5.      English OOP from Del Rey ISBN for those who maybe interested in supporting the author.   Vol 01: 9780345492333   Vol 02: 9780345493200   Vol 03: 9780345493217   Vol 04: 9780345493224   Vol 05: 9780345493231   Vol 06: 9780345499172   Vol 07: 9780345501691   Vol 08: 9780345501707   Vol 09: 9780345506719   Vol 10: 9780345508447   Vol 11: 9780345515858

She is the perfect student  beautiful  clever and with lots of friends... He is an ordinary boy in the class  staring at her from afar but one day he sees her in a very compromising situation! How will she react? The lives of these two will now intermingle with totally unexpected outcomes!

title_en: My Death Flags Show No Sign of Ending
description: When he came to his senses  Hirasawa Kazuki  a normal university student  found himself in possession of the body of a game's character. Moreover  it was Harold Stokes  the story's most hated character who was even given the title "King of Trash" by the players. Myriads of landmines are just waiting for him to step on them  like death flags! Will Harold be able to clear the survival route while avoiding the countless death flags in his way?!

Mysterious alien life-forms invade Earth! Most of humanity is wiped off the face of the planet. John  his sister  and the remaining survivors hope to find a new world to inhabit… But one day  they're targeted by aliens again! (MANGA Plus)

From Seven Seas: “I have no interest in real girls!” So claims Okumura  the president of the school’s manga club. He’s your typical otaku  obsessed with a sexy (fictional) 2D manga character known as Liliel. Then the new school year starts  and a (real!) 3D girl named Lilysa whose passion is cosplay joins the club. Lilysa convinces Okumura to become her photographer–and guess who her favorite manga character is? Not only that  but Lilysa is into modeling the fetishy stuff  The boundaries between 2D and 3D start to blur as this hot-blooded romantic comedy unfolds.  English volumes by [Seven Seas Entertainment](https://sevenseasentertainment.com/series/2-5-dimensional-seduction/)
The Red Ribbon Army returns! Their mission: to defeat Son Goku!

Natsuo  the ever-reliable office senpai  always calm  always composed  always there when someone needs help... is hiding his weak and anxious nature behind his perfect facade. How long can he keep up the act?

title_en: Yuri no Hajimari wa Dorei Kara
description: Chiyoko Hanamura  a self-proclaimed *gyaru* who failed her high school debut  was skipping class as usual on the rooftop when her junior  Sakine  approached her. It seemed like Sakine had a favor to ask  as she handed Chiyoko a love letter. "Could you turn down this confession for me?" she asked. However  the sender was unknown. For the sake of her adorable junior  and to maintain her *gyaru* dignity  Chiyoko resolved to take on the task and went to refuse the confession...

Official Hetalia AU. "This world  although similar to the one we know of  is just slightly different. Data-wise  it's pretty much the same thing  just a lot more punk and grunge-like this time. 200 crowded districts  each with a unique culture and history of their own  each with a boss in charge  in a spinning circle of harmony and chaos. Yet a new disruption was about to arise."
Spin-off series about the everyday life of the members of the Armed Detective Agency and the Port Mafia.
High-school student Hasumi-chan is drawn to Homura-sensei  a young  socially awkward biology teacher generally seen as weak and boring but recognized by her to be kind.      ---

What makes a 'proper adult'? Inspired by the words of his late father  Yutaro Urashima sought to become an upstanding member of society by developing and strictly adhering to his own "Articles of Adulthood." Little did he know  however  that those same articles would go on to dramatically change the world...

Indifferent student Takatsugi-kun is living an uneventful life  until he meets Niina  a girl who's utterly obsessed with baseball. Though she seems to have nothing but baseball on her mind  Takatsugi finds himself drawn to her. Their relationship progresses smoothly... or does it?

Mokume is a first-year college student and occult fanatic! She hunts down an older student  Kugutsu  who is rumored to attract urban legends of all kinds… What will happen when she joins the Occult Club?

Tsuna comes home one day  only to be greeted by a little baby mafioso who apparently is his new home tutor. His job is to guide Tsuna into his role as the 10th Boss of the Vongola mafia family. With the help of all his new friends and an array of special items such as the "Dying Will Bullet"  he might just be able to do it.

Kazuki  the daughter of a wealthy businessman  and a straight-A student at a prestigious school for girls  meets Moeka  a wild girl from a rowdy school. What becomes of Kazuki when witnessing a steamy moment between Moeka and her boyfriend leaves her all shaken up...?! Find out in this seaside tale of two polar opposites and their fated encounter.

title_en: Mobile Suit Gundam: The battle tales of Flanagan Boone
description: A new tragic tale from the "One Year War" unfolds. Flanagan Boone  a Zeon soldier  trained under his beloved Commander Garma Zabi  but then  the Gundam  the "White Devil of the Federation " appeared... A new One Year War begins from the perspective of Flanagan Boone  who appeared in the famous episode "Across the Atlantic Ocean " (Episode 28) of the "Mobile Suit Gundam" anime!

Assistant cameraman Osaka Kippei is one day invited to a cosplay event by his coworker where he meets the most handsome man he has ever seen: Ichinose Makoto. And through twists and turns they become friends.  In reality  however  Kippei is mistakenly thinking Makoto is man and Makoto  trying to avoid disappointing Kippei and losing him  is doing her best to act like a man for him. But what are these conflicting feelings they feel!? The mistaken love comedy between Kippei who thinks she's a man and Makoto the handsome crossplayer starts!!

title_en: Koishita Hito wa  Imouto no Kawari ni Shindekure to Itta
description: In place of her sister  Wisteria took on the job of becoming a guardian of a poisonous otherworld. One day  a man who resembled her first love dropped out of the sky. His name was Lloyd. To her surprise  he was the son of her first love!   To win the hand of the princess  he has come to ask for Wisteria's partner  Saltis  a sentient holy sword. Having survived in the other world frozen in time  Wisteria easily defeated Lloyd and told him to go home... But despite her best efforts at persuasion  Lloyd refused to leave.   "Please take me as your apprentice  until I get strong enough to defeat you!"   So began a one-sided relationship between master and apprentice. Will her time  which has remained frozen for so long  begin to move again? A master-student love fantasy between a lonely former noble lady and a prodigy prince!
While cross-dressing  I was hit on by a handsome guy  except she wasn't actually a handsome guy!

title_en: Taisho Junai Fukushuutan - Haha wo Yaki Korosareta Watashi wa Oni to Kasu
description: Yuu is born to a concubine of the Todo family  a prominent family  and is mistreated and treated like a slave from an early age. In particular  her half-sister Nadeshiko pretends to be friendly with Yuu in front of Shinnosuke  whom she has a crush on  but behind her back  Nadeshiko bullies Yuu to no end. Yuu had hoped to be free someday  but she was unable to do so because she could not abandon her mother  who was locked up in a dungeon. One day  her mother dies in an unexplained fire  and Yuu  who went to save her  also disappears.  Seven years later  Yuu  who was thought to have disappeared  grows up beautifully as if she were a different person  changes her name to Haruhi  returns to the Todo family  and begins to take revenge for the death of her murdered mother.

After being held in disdain and having his life put in danger  an orphan from the Demonic Cult  Cheon Yeo-Woon  has an unexpected visit from his descendant from the future who inserts a nano machine into Cheon Yeo-Woon's body  which drastically changes Cheon Yeo-Woon's life after its activation. The story of Cheon Yeo-Woon's journey of bypassing the Demonic Cult and rising to become the best martial artist has just begun.    --- - [Webtoon PV](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_t397hfZC3w) --- - [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/drama/nanomasin/list?title_no=2085)  - [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/moutianchengweimoshen/list?title_no=1519)  - [Official Indonesian Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/id/fantasy/nano-mashin/list?title_no=2194)  - [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0000948)  - [Official Thai Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/th/action/nano-mashin/list?title_no=2171)

title_en: Camera-senpai to Sewayaki Jouzu na Kouhai-chan
description: The goal of the camera department manager  Ayato  is the ultimate beauty that he has set himself.  To take "boob pictures".   The ideal that we once met at the beachIn order to take a picture of a beautiful girl with breasts  I involved my junior and assistant YukiLet the beautiful girls on campus take a "breast photo"! But--?

title_en: Ookami no Kawa wo Kabutta Hitsujihime
description: "Wolf" Rikujo Aki is working as a butler in the Land of the Sheep. She loved the quiet and peaceful life there  but by chance  she fell in love with Momo Siudafares  the third princess of the Sheep Kingdom  and became her tutor.
What has not yet been seen  and what cannot be seen - "X". Beyblade  accelerated to the limit (extreme)  blasts through a new era!

tags: Thriller|Time Travel|Demons|Animals|Comedy|Martial Arts|Adventure|Office Workers|Drama|Delinquents|Slice of Life|Supernatural
description: When the Devil King announces his retirement  he calls forth his two sons  Yomi and Sora  to give them each a quest. Whichever of them finds a pure Yamato maiden within a year would inherit the throne of the Devil King  while the other would die. Thus begins Sora's sex-fuelled adventure to find a woman that can satisfy his father…

An adaption the critically acclaimed novel *Chornobyl Prayer: A Chronicle of the Future* by Belarusian Nobel Laureate Svetlana Alexievich  a collection of several accounts of people affected by the 1986  Chornobyl nuclear catastrophe and its aftermath.

Beginning as four bonus chapters following the end of 'Vampire Knight'  'Vampire Knight Memories' is now an official sequel series written and illustrated by Matsuri Hino. The series follows the events that occurred whilst Kaname slept for a thousand years  as well as his time in the future with Yuuki's daughters  Ai and Ren.

Action thriller about an obsessed lonely man with a delusional plot to save Japan by assassinating a politician. But his twisted plan is disturbed when he witnesses a young girl next door getting abducted by the Yakuza. He decides to save her but his attempt ends in a chaotic massacre where he manages to kill the gangsters. But things only get worse from here on out  now he's getting hunted down by even more ruthless killers.

All of a sudden  Miko is able to see grotesque monsters all around her; but no one else can. Rather than trying to run away or face them  she instead musters all of her courage and... ignores them. Join in on her day-to-day life as she keeps up her best poker face despite the supernatural goings-on. ___ **Alt Official Raw:** [niconico Manga](http://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/37662)

A world in which Korea is the global capital of combat sports. At Nam-Il High School where the best and most talented students of martial arts reside  Jiu Ji-Tae suddenly finds himself thrust into their midst despite being a total weakling.      By neutralizing his physical shortcomings through jiu-jitsu  can he rise to the top of the fight classes?     ---

title_en: Kill the Male Lead to Become the Villainess
description: After killing the male lead  the originally innocent girl transformed into a villainess. Just as she was about to enjoy her newfound freedom  she died a violent death and returned back to the start of the game. Having carried over with her all the skills she acquired in her previous "playthrough"  she was prepared to kill the male lead again; however  the current circumstances seem a bit... strange?

A legendary assassin found the light of life. It was an underground idol!  Endou Owaru is the most powerful assassin in the Fujisan-kai  a huge black market organization. He was feared as a “killing machine” because of his ruthless work and overwhelming fighting power  but one day he decides to retire. The reason for his decision was to live his life proudly with Kaorin of the underground idol Ro~Xesia.  Can a man covered in blood and sorrow protect the light of life that he has finally obtained?!

_The secret between me and her is trivial yet important._  Hajime Takahashi  enrolled in Shuubi High School solely because it's the sacred place of his favorite manga. Everywhere in the school are locations that appeared in the manga  and he's super excited! Amidst this excitement  Takahashi meets a beautiful girl  Yayoi Kurokawa  who looks just like the heroine from his favorite work  and they come to share a certain secret.
*ODDTAXI* is back in action!   The story of Hiroshi Odogawa  a poor cab driver  is interwoven with various characters and takes on a completely new form with new protagonists!

title_en: Shingeki no Eroko-san: Hen na Oneesan wa Danshi Kousei to Nakayoku Naritai
description: Shindou Eruko  a glasses  big breasted beauty  found a job as a handyman for the Amaguri Handyman service after her NEET life comes to an end as her savings ran out. She immediately falls for her co-worker Hoshi-kun on their first day working together  but there's a problem: Hoshi-kun is a high school boy  while Eruko is a 27 years old onee-san who has trouble telling reality and delusions apart. She ends up constantly scheming to get close to Hoshi-kun to turn many of her delusions into reality  but after several near-misses  it became apparent to Eruko that Hoshi-kun does  indeed  have feelings toward her.    This manga takes place after Vol.14 in  [Henjo - Hen na Joshi Kousei Amaguri Senko](https://mangadex.org/title/15331/henjyo-the-strange-female-high-schooler-amaguri-senko)

This is a world where awakened people and alienated beasts coexist. Zhang Ping was lucky to become an awakened person  but his ability was rated as useless. He was unwilling to live a mediocre life  so he resolutely swallowed the contract gem that ordinary people avoided like snakes and scorpions  contracted himself  and became his own summoned beast! From then on  the whole world opened up to him. Ever-changing superpowers  endless alienated beasts  and dangerous parallel worlds  everything is possible.

tags: Long Strip|Romance|Boys' Love|Drama|School Life|Web Comic|Full Color
description: The flawless Prince Nazaire changes schools in hopes of wooing a bride… only to encounter the tyrant Cassius Li! At first  the two cannot stand one another  as they constantly infuriate each other. Yet between ball dances  rescues  and secret rendezvous  Nazaire and Cassius begin seeing each other for who they truly are. But love between a prince and a commoner could never happen  and if Nazaire hopes to ascend the throne  he will have to give up Cassius. Torn between love and duty  can the prince and tyrant reach their happily ever after?

title_en: How to Walk the Protagonist's Path of Flowers
description: Life never goes according to plan—something I had yet to learn back then. Because of a friend from my past life  I begrudgingly read a male-oriented fantasy harem novel… only to wake up as a character inside it: Kang Nahyun.  Special perks for reincarnators? Ha! As if. I had no money  no connections  and nothing but a hardcore survival mode to keep me going.  But just before high school  I awakened into the “Sniper” position  earning myself a spot at the Awakener Academy!  And if I can’t be the protagonist  then I’ll just hitch a ride on the protagonist’s flowery path  right?  So I make it my plan to stick close to Na Yuhan  the real hero of the story  snag a few scraps of luck  and quietly bow out…  Except something feels off. With every passing day  my steps are veering further and further from the plan…  The chaotic Academy life of sunshine-heroine(?) Kang Nahyun begins now! “How to Walk the Protagonist's Path of Flowers” — coming your way!

The mask of Hannya  a jealous she-devil located in an old antique store  scrutinizes the darkness of men's hearts and knows the secrets of all the objects that have been accumulating there since time immemorial. Prepare well because certain death comes at odd times  and whether you are a young man or a tired old man  whatever she finds you  she will take you with her to hell.

With the Hive of Darkness and High Priest Tenkai defeated  peace has returned to the capital thanks to the Imperial Combat Troupe. But a new enemy has risen and threatens to disturb this new year of peace! The curtain is rising  the bells are ringing and a new battle is about to begin  for the Kouma have been resurrected by their new King: AOI SATAN

In broad daylight  a horrific mass murder occurs  claiming the life of Mina  a high school student. Miraculously  she survives through a heart transplant. As Mina begins to settle back into a semblance of normalcy  she becomes alarmed by an overwhelming surge of murderous intent that she's never experienced before.  Unbeknownst to her  the heart she received belonged to Misako Shimizu  the very perpetrator of the mass murder.  Mina's parents watch in confusion and fear as their beloved daughter starts transforming into a person they can no longer recognize. The murderous urge only grows stronger and seems unstoppable.  Witness the beginning of an unprecedented family suspense drama!  (Source: Bookwalker)

Kamine Shouta is a boy who is able to "see" people's hearts  though the ability has caused him to distance himself from people. His meeting with saxophone player Tokisaka Hibiki changes both of them for the better  and Tokisaka convinces Kamine to join the school concert band. Now Kamine  who knows nothing about music  will have to use his ability to win over the band's section leaders in the hopes of leading the band to the national competition next year… as its conductor!

The unknown interior designer  Hans Duan (22 years old)  was involved in a criminal dispute as he designed the house for one of the members in that group. Unfortunately  he was persecuted as a murderer due to the case and sentenced to death. In the prison  he met a scientist from the government (Code name No.73) who asked him to take part in a human experiment. But the experiment failed and Hans died. His body was buried in a dump in the city. However  the experimental medicine left in his body leads to gene mutation. Hans is revived and changed into a female. What will happen on him (her)?

A white snake who is a divine messenger and a childhood friend with a mystery. Entangled obsessions in a Japanese-style fantasy. Tsubaki  a high school student with a predisposition for bad luck  has a one-sided love for his childhood friend Sakuya  who is both beautiful and talented. Then  one day while leaving school they are randomly attacked on the street.  In the ancient capital Kyoto  a lovestory defying fate unfolds.

title_en: Tsuihou Sarenakatta Otoko ~Nidome no Jinsei wa Dogeza kara Hajimarimashita~
description: A mere villager  Cross Vish  somehow ended up joining the hero's party by some strange twist of fate. Cross  an ordinary man with no special powers whatsoever. Yet  for some reason  the heroes genuinely considered Cross a true comrade. There was no way he would ever be banished from the party. And that was precisely why Cross kept agonizing. What could a useless person like him possibly contribute to the hero's party? And then... Cross came to understand his role. At the very moment when the Demon King  on the verge of death  unleashed magic toward the hero—.

In the year 2080  the world is like it is now  yet different. Government-arranged marriages  elaborate plastic surgery  and medical science are at the forefront of Japanese society.  Sanda Kazushige is a middle-school student who hasn't quite matured  despite being in the thralls of puberty. Put into a life-threatening situation by his classmate Fuyumura  Sanda discovers his uncanny ability to turn into a burly (and more grown) Santa Claus  and is thrown into a world of chaos to save his fellow students in only ways Santa Claus can do  while trying to solve the mysteries of the school he attends and the truth to where his supposedly-dead classmate Ono went.

Hiro  a high school boy living in the countryside  is walking along the beach one day when he is approached by a black gal who looks like she belongs in Shibuya. He is surprized to find out that she's Rio  his childhood friend who he used to play with in the old days! An explosive reunion × countryside × sea romcom with heart-throbbing situations  delivered in a double feature!!

With the sudden acquisition of the ability  Kang Mina’s life is completely turned upside down. Now  she stands at a crossroads where a single choice can lead to irreversible consequences. Amidst anger  confusion  and a suppressed sense of justice  Mina struggles with how to use her newfound power as she embarks on a new journey. Where will her power take her?

A mysterious girl wakes up one day in a twisted and demonic world  filled with death  despair and nightmarish like creatures. May she find the true meaning of her relation to this world? Or shall she fall victim just like the rest...  Chapters and Volumes uploaded by the artist.

title_en: Isekai Shoukan Oji-san no Juumusou Life ~Sabage Suki Salaryman wa Kaisha Owari ni Isekai e Chokki suru~
description: The middle-aged man and airsoft enthusiast Daisuke Koga is summoned to a different world on his 40th birthday. Given the ability to turn airsoft guns into real guns  Daisuke must save the other world while traveling back and forth between reality and the fantasy world. Alongside female swordsman Rena  Daisuke becomes the only gun user and dominates in the fantasy world after work!

Lynn's village getting attacked by bandits doesn't keep her down in the dumps for long! Picking up a sword housing an extraordinary pervert... I mean hero  Siegfried  she sets off on a journey of many bouts with various degenerat... ahem  heroes! ___ **Links:** - Alternative Official English - [Comikey](https://comikey.com/comics/rosen-garten-saga-manga/525/)  [MangaPlaza](https://mangaplaza.com/title/0303005019/)

In the middle of the 21st century  the world was on the brink of World War III. But superheroes from across the globe appeared and helped bring an era of peace. With the crisis averted  the Heroes returned to their home countries where they now help with domestic matters. ___ [Official X](https://x.com/SHY_off)  From Yen Press: Earth was on the brink of a third World War when super-powered individuals came forth from each country around the globe  ending the conflict and ushering in a new era of relative peace. Among those heroes  Japan is represented by a timid young girl known as “Shy.” She may spend more time worrying about her own shortcomings than she does battling villains  but she'll show the world that despite it all she still has the heart of a hero.

title_en: Mahouka Koukou no Rettousei - Yotsuba Keishou-hen
description: In December  Miyuki receives an invitation for the Yotsuba's new year's family gathering. However  unlike previous years  they specially added "Everyone must attend" on the invitation. Miyuki understands that "the time has come" — it is time to decide the next head for the Yotsuba Clan.   — If she is elected  her brother will be free.   — If she becomes the next head  she will be forced to marry someone else.   Miyuki's heart is a mess.   The truth of the Brother and Sister relationship is finally unveiled!? Yotsuba Keishou-hen begins!      Adaptation of the original novel's volume 16.

Urabe Haruna  24 years old. Hobbies: smoking  drinking  cosplay.  Urabe Haruna  a girl whose daily posts on social media are accompanied by 1 word  “Today”  has been turned into a serialized comic! She spends her days messing with  teasing  and toying with her junior  Kinoshita-kun. ___ **Alt Official Raw:** [niconico Manga](https://sp.manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/70408)

Upon being reincarnated into a fantasy world  Ryo wants to live out his days in peace with his newfound water magic. He can only conjure a cupful at a time  but it's enough to eke out a comfortable existence — or so he thought.  The powers that be cast him into the wild outlands with nothing more than a humble shack  a single knife  some food... and abilities that are yet beyond his comprehension. The area is overrun by monsters and there's nary another human in sight. Ryo must now figure out how to survive above all else  but he's ready to take bulls  boars  and a whole host of other monsters by the horns if it means seizing the life he wants for himself.  Each new victory brings a new challenge  but what could a fateful encounter with a headless horseman  a dragon  and a castaway swordsman have in common? They're the first steps on a grand journey that will take Ryo beyond the borders of all he knows to become the greatest water magician the world has ever seen — one adventure at a time.

title_en: The Male Lead Is Obsessed With My Health
description: I was reincarnated as an extra  the non-existent childhood friend of the male lead  who dies early in the novel. I can’t even avoid the time limit dead flag. That’s why I was living like this…   “Why aren’t you healthy?”   “I’m healthy.”   “Why are you sick again? Did I allow you to be sick?”   The male lead became obsessed with my health. Oh  please  can someone get rid of this guy! — I was definitely reincarnated as an extra with no presence. But my new life is unfolding strangely.   “Why are you doing this for me?”   “Because I like you.”   Suddenly the sunny male lead started sticking to me..   “Mom  do it for me.”   “I’m a man.”  And a handsome guardian who became my mother (gender: male)…   “Hello  daughter!”   Even a dad who was supposed to die appeared before me… Also..   “From today on  I’m your dad.”   A suspicious human was aiming to become my dad. Why did I put myself in this undeserved situation as an extra? Can I really become healthy?

Ume Sasaki  a senior in high school  is helping out at her great-grandmother's ryokan during this summer vacation. She goes to the ryokan in hopes of getting some hints about her future...? This is the brightest and most dazzling "memory (memoir)" of the girls.

A year has passed since Kirito and Asuna’s return from the Underworld. With them is Alice  who has been given a physical body. But their peace is quickly broken when the three are suddenly thrust into an unfamiliar game  Unital Ring. This new world is a survival MMO that fuses together every VRMMO created with the Seed program. As soon as it starts  Kirito finds himself with nothing but his underwear. Now  he’s got to challenge a mysterious VRMMOSVG under desperate circumstances!

title_en: Jujutsu Kaisen - Omoide wa Kimi ni Azuketoku (Doujinshi)
description: Pairing: Gojo Satoru x Itadori Yuuji

title_en: Yuusha Party wo Oidasareta Kiyoubinbou ~Party Jijou de Fuyojitsushi wo Yatteita Kenshi  Bannou e to Itaru~
description: Being a "Jack-of-all-trades" is a sin!? Despite trying his hardest  he's been told that he's out of a job!! A member of the Hero's party  Orun  is suddenly told by the party leader; "You're insufficient  you need to leave." Additionally  Orun is mocked by his former comrades as a "Jack-of-All-Trades  Master of None". True  he is well-rounded with no particular skill standing out. Still  he would complete every task with a skillful hand  what's more  he always performed at peak performance...! Orun  having grown frustrated  began working solo. However  deep within his heart lay the drive to become the ultimate "Jack-of-All-Trades  Master of None"  an "All-Rounder"!

title_en: Ore to Seijo ga Dekiteru Koto ga Baretara Kono Party wa Houkai suru
description: Rin  the gloomy-type mage  somehow ends up in a secret relationship with the party’s sweetheart  Sophia.  But for certain reasons  no one must ever find out.  Caught between “We can’t get caught!” and “But I still wanna do it!” Rin’s heart is ready to explode!

Her trust broken by her girlfriend  Saya moves out of the room they were living in  and  with nowhere else to go  she has no choice but to stay with her sister's family. There  she reunites with her sister's daughter  Rui  who she often used to play with when she was younger. Rui used to be such an innocent girl  but now she's almost like succubus meant to lead people astray  boasting calculating smiles and charm unbefitting of her age. Day after day Saya is filled with confusion and doubt  her resolve gradually wavering away due to Rui's intimate sense of distance  until eventually she loses sight of any reason to turn Rui down...

title_en: Urenokori no Dorei Elf o Hirotta no de  Musume ni Suru Koto ni shita
description: Weiss  a magician living in the scoundrel-filled Zenith  finds a high elf girl for sale  a higher level elf species that is said to be extinct. He decides to buy her and raise her as his daughter. The high elf doesn't even know how to speak the language  but Weiss' hard work in raising her seems to be paying off...?

title_en: Tensei ni Hakobijin no Isekai Kouryakuhou
description: A man who yearned for a life of freedom reincarnates into another world and becomes a carrier—a non-combative class considered useless. Can he make use of his skills to live his dream life or could he be meant for something more? A sexy isekai manga about a man proving there’s more to him than his class!  Sei has always yearned for a life of freedom  and when he’s reborn into another world  it seems like he would finally have his dream life. Except he was born as a “carrier ” a non-combative class that mostly uses their abilities to transport goods. But Sei has found a way to use his powers both in and out of fights  surviving on his own despite his low class. And while he travels the land seeing sights and picking up women  he’ll prove that a lowly carrier is capable of conquering the world!

In the light of day  Sister Alicia Snowell is a faithful and devoted bride of the gods  dedicated to serving the Holy Church and its followers. In the shadows  she's one of the Church’s top inquisitors  tasked with hunting down and eliminating heretics by any means necessary.  Alicia's latest mission: assassinate the Hero Elcyon  slayer of the mighty Demon Lord  whose growing fame threatens to eclipse the Church's political power. In order to kill the divinely protected  supposedly unkillable Hero  Alicia first needs to win Elcyon's heart. There's just one problem — Elcyon turns out to be a girl named Cion! Alicia's at a loss for what to do  but while she tries to figure out how to seduce a girl  more trouble brews on the horizon. With remnants of the demon army still at large  Alicia and Cion face one deadly supernatural battle after another! Where will the two girls' intertwining paths lead them? ___ * **[Official English Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/series/the-hero-killing-bride)** * **Character Designer:** [Enji](https://mangadex.org/author/c2125541-abf3-4041-839d-f303e2987659)

title_en: Kuro no Senki II - Isekai Teni Shita Boku ga Saikyou na no wa Bed no Ue dake no You desu
description: Kurono Crawford (Chrono Crawford)  a noble of Cepheus Empire had a secret. It was that he came from a Different world... Modern Japan. Having the knowledge about the modern weapons and his sense of values  he was an existence almost like a cheat  aiming to be the "Harem King." Abandoned by his superiors  left in command of the Empire's rejects consisting of demi-humans such as Minotaurs  Dwarfs  and Elves  and thrust into a position as head of a poor fiefdom  Chrono will do everything he can to rebuild and strengthen his forces and revitalize the land  aided in part by his knowledge of the other world.

Kugayama Hajime  a boy living in the countryside  comes back to his old classmate Momose Akira  whom he used to admire. Just as he is about to watch her from afar and enjoy his sweet and sour youth  Akira makes an unexpected approach. And there was a "fate" that was more than he could have imagined.

It's the dawn of a new millennium....while all the people of the world are living their lives  something is happening in Africa   where the first humans were born. Now a new type of human is going to rise  and it''s going to change the world  either we like it or not. Evolve or get extinct  there no other choices in this manga which explores the meaning of life  evolution and what being human really means.

title_en: Tonari no Kuderella wo Amayakashitara  Uchi no Aikagi wo Watasu Koto ni Natta
description: Katagiri Naomi  a high school student who lived alone for two years  meets a beautiful girl with black hair and blue eyes  who moves into the apartment next door. The girl's name is Yui. It seemed that she really was a noblewoman  and her nickname was "Quderella" because of her nonchalant attitude at school. Naomi knows that Yui doesn't want to depend on others  but she's actually quite naive  so Naomi decides to help her.  "Today what are we having at night... Karaage chicken  huh?" "That's right because the price of chicken is discounted today" "I love your fried chicken so I'm really looking forward to it"

Meet Natsumi Harukawa  a young office lady. During work  she is asocial and constantly looks cranky. However  the truth is that Harukawa-san is simply very hungry  and spends her time after work eating delicious foods.

Life has been tough since Viola's Dad passed away 3 years ago. After days by days training  she embarks on a mission to explore ruins hoping for a fortune  together with two explorers she hired  Rain and Bleu.   Little does she know  that this expedition will cause her life to turn inside out. What she hopes for a fortune  goes into a curse instead. A strong curse which could turn her into a demon  a fairytale like in which people already think of as extinct.

Momoko Miyashita is at the top of her class at school  but her home life is another story. An orphan  she lives with her aunt and cousin and works long hours at their coffee shop. One day  a transfer student named Shou Fujimaru joins her class. He looks like a delinquent with his pompadour  motorcycle  and leather jacket  but in reality  he's the son of a distinguished family. He falls in love with Momoko  and is ready to do anything to meet her standards  but a romance like this won't be accepted by the people around them…

As the eldest son of the Li Group's President  Li Dao'an has a secret: He is intersex. At the age of 13  Li Dao'an's secret was accidentally revealed by the Chu Group's heir  Chu Xiao. Despite being old rivals and often bickering  Chu Xiao didn't mock or shun Li Dao'an  but instead proposed to him  surprising everyone.

A girl named Nona lives in plain sight among humans  hiding her true identity as a mage as she spends her days in peace with her best friend Lovi. But one day  Nona uses magic to fix Lovi's glasses and subsequently catches the attention of the Bureau of Magic Surveillance. A simple good deed becomes the trigger that sets Nona's destiny in motion...

Baek Sarang  who was comfortable eating alone  meditating alone  and drinking alone. Yu Pyeonghwa wants to get along with others even at a loss. Love and peace  who have lived conflicting lives  meet each other and learn a new way of life. A realistic romance that is more adult than you think and more childish than you think

Losing a loved one is so painful that one may sometimes wish to be able to resurrect them—a weakness that the enigmatic Millennium Earl exploits. To make his mechanical weapons known as "Akuma " he uses the souls of the dead that are called back. Once a soul is placed in an Akuma  it is trapped forever  and the only way to save them is to exorcise them from their vessel using the Anti-Akuma weapon  "Innocence."  After spending three years as the disciple of General Cross  Allen Walker is sent to the Black Order—an organization comprised of those willing to fight Akuma and the Millennium Earl—to become an official Exorcist. With an arm as his Innocence and a cursed eye that can see the suffering souls within an Akuma  it's up to Allen and his fellow Exorcists to stop the Millennium Earl's ultimate plot: one that can lead to the destruction of the world.

There is a group of beautiful girls who fight against the "gods of calamity" who bring misfortune to people. They are called "flower shrine maidens" and live together in the "Night District Castle". Arata  a mere part-time high school teacher  decides to become the chief of the flower shrine maidens after the death of his father. However  organizing a group of flower shrine maidens full of unique and problematic characters is more difficult than he imagined...

title_en: Yomuin-san wa Yuusha ja Arimasen node
description: A certain girl genius with more power than knowledge accidentally summoned dozens of students and teachers into a dangerous world filled with beasts and magic  but the protagonist isn't a student or the homeroom teacher... it's the janitor.  At the time of their summoning  the students and teachers each gained a power formed from their soul  but not the janitor. As the janitor was about to be bestowed with a power that would protect him  his power was forcibly taken from him by an arrogant student. Having gone three years without a contract extension  he failed to get a job after having graduated from a third-rate university. Somehow he is still a contractor at 25 years old and was a janitor for 2 years  with a take-home monthly salary of less than ¥120 000. From a society that rejected him  he was thrust into a world that rejected him. And what janitor-san wished from the Goddess who took pity on him was... ___ **Character Designer:** [Iwamoto Eiri](https://mangadex.org/author/6072165b-41b3-4b12-9afc-f99efff4cb72)

title_en: Tensei Kizoku  Kantei Skill de Nariagaru ~Jakushou Ryouchi wo Uketsuida node  Yuushuu na Jinzai wo Fuyashiteitara  Saikyou Ryouchi ni Natteta~
description: After being reincarnated  Ars Louvent is supposed to live in a different world as a weak aristocrat. Both his physical strength and intelligence were mediocre in both worlds  but here he naturally possessed a skill called "Appraisal" that allowed him to see the potential of any person. By gathering talented people by his side  Ars uses this "Appraisal" skill to transform his weak territory into the strongest one! But the road ahead of him won't be so simple.

title_en: Yashaou No Saiai Shitagerareta Chiyu No Otome Wa Dekiai Sareru
description: Mei  the daughter of a family that exterminates vicious monsters  was raised in a cold environment  lacking the power to exorcise demons. Meanwhile  her arrogant younger brother violates a taboo and awakens Ryouga  the king of another world! Mei is left behind... Mei is in danger  but Ryouga is actually a gentle  intelligent  and handsome young man. He teaches her the value of the rare "healing power" she possesses  and invites her to "become my princess."  (Source: Comic Walker  translated)

An omnibus of horror stories that explores relatable  everyday fears experienced in the contemporary Reiwa era. Each story in the series reflects modern anxieties  focusing on the fears lurking within daily life  which continue to escalate.

Riku Mikami  who is starting as a university student in the spring  finds out that his favorite VTuber is taking a hiatus. The one who cheers him up is Rui Saionji  his classmate. Will Riku resolve to make Rui his "oshi"?
